Worried, stressed or anxious during COVID-19? Speak to our counsellors today for support. \n
If you are facing a mental health crisis, please call our Helpline or seek medical help at our 24-hour Emergency Services located in our hospital. \n
We provide round the clock emotional support for those in distress \n
Launched by Former President S R Nathan on 4 Feb 2006 to combat mental health stigma and encourage early treatment \n
Our team of qualified counselors and youth workers will be able to provide face to face counselling, group mentoring, peer and community support and family therapy sessions \n
